meanings.definition: Showing off in a flashy or ostentatious manner.
meanings.sent1: She wore a flaunty hat to the party, attracting everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The car's flaunty paint job made it stand out on the road.
meanings.sent3: His flaunty outfit made him look like a walking disco ball.
meanings.sent4: The flaunty decorations at the event dazzled all the guests.
meanings.sent5: The peacock's flaunty feathers shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: He would flaunty his new watch whenever someone asked for the time.
meanings.sent2: She flaunty her artistic skills by creating beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent3: The chef would flaunty his culinary expertise by preparing elaborate dishes.
meanings.sent4: The magician flaunty his tricks to impress the audience.
meanings.sent5: The athlete flaunty his medals proudly after winning the competition.

meanings.definition: A person who flaunts their wealth or possessions.
meanings.sent1: The flaunty in the neighborhood always drove the fanciest cars.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the flaunty of the town for her extravagant lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The flaunty loved showing off their designer clothes at every opportunity.
meanings.sent4: At the party, the flaunty made sure everyone noticed their expensive jewelry.
meanings.sent5: The flaunty's mansion was the talk of the town due to its grandeur.
